name: Catch Me If You Can (MrThaw)
description:
Catch Me If You Can is a single player third person shooter game where your team and other teams try to steal the annoying little boy to win the match. But beware you must be patient to play this game.

Features

-Steal the little boy and survive matches

-Steal the little boy and kill more opponents matches

-Total of 12 levels

Control

Controlling Player
Move - W, A, S, D
Aim - Right Mouse Button
Shoot - Left Mouse Button
Reload - R
Crouch - Space

Commanding Teammates
Attack Command - Left Shift + Q (When the enemies are near)
Follow Command - Left Shift + E

Asset used:

- Characters and animations from www.sharpaccent.com

-Off-screen target indicators codes from https://github.com/jinincarnate/off-screen-indicator

System Requirements

CPU - Intel core Pentium G5400 (Anything lower than this CPU is not recommended)

RAM - 4GB

GPU - Intel UHD 610 or  Nividia GTX 1650

Storage - 600MB of free space

Made by Mr Thaw
